nodes.description: 当局在Thatta的Jungshahi铁路站附近发现并排除了一个放置在铁路轨道上的炸弹，避免了针对预定在该轨道上运行的列车的恐怖袭击。
nodes.support_text: THATTA: Authorities on Sunday found and defused a bomb placed on the railway track near Jungshahi railway station in Thatta, averting a potential terrorist attack targeting trains scheduled to run on the track.

nodes.description: 媒体报告称，炸弹被发现于卡拉奇轨道上，距离Jungshahi铁路站A站三公里。
nodes.support_text: According to media reports, the bomb was found on a Karachi track, three kilometers away from the Jungshahi railway station

nodes.description: 从Hyderabad派遣的炸弹排爆小组成功排除了0.5公斤的遥控炸弹。
nodes.support_text: A bomb disposal squad dispatched from Hyderabad successfully defused the 0.5 kg bomb

nodes.description: 据SSP Thatta Shabbir Sethar告诉媒体，这枚炸弹可能针对的是运行在该轨道上的Hazara Express和Zakria Express。
nodes.support_text: SSP Thatta Shabbir Sethar told media. The remote-controlled bomb could have targeted Hazara Express and Zakria Express running on the track

nodes.description: 在炸弹威胁之后，警方逮捕了七名嫌疑人。
nodes.support_text: Following the bomb threat, seven suspects have been taken into custody, the police officials said.

nodes.description: 与此同时，从卡拉奇到信德内陆和从拉合尔和拉瓦尔品第到卡拉奇的列车已获准运行。
nodes.support_text: Meanwhile, the trains have been cleared to run from Karachi to interior Sindh and from Lahore and Rawalpindi to Karachi.

edges.support_text: THATTA: Authorities on Sunday found and defused a bomb placed on the railway track near Jungshahi railway station in Thatta, averting a potential terrorist attack targeting trains scheduled to run on the track.
According to media reports, the bomb was found on a Karachi track, three kilometers away from the Jungshahi railway station
A bomb disposal squad dispatched from Hyderabad successfully defused the 0.5 kg bomb
SSP Thatta Shabbir Sethar told media. The remote-controlled bomb could have targeted Hazara Express and Zakria Express running on the track
Following the bomb threat, seven suspects have been taken into custody, the police officials said.
